spell_tooltip.description: Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.
Kick upwards, dealing 83,181 Physical damage, and reducing the effectiveness of healing on the target for 10 sec.
Kick upwards, dealing 81,858 Physical damage, and reducing the effectiveness of healing on the target for 10 sec.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Rising Sun Kick deals 70% increased damage. Spinning Crane Kick deals 10% additional damage.
Increases all healing taken by 4%.
Reduces all damage taken by 3%.
Removes all Poison and Disease effects from the target.

Every 10 sec, your next Vivify becomes instant and its healing is increased by 40%.

This effect also reduces the energy cost of Vivify by 75%.
Paralysis now removes all Enrage effects from its target.
Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 3 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Paralysis by 15 sec and the cooldown of Leg Sweep by 10 sec.

Every 15 sec, your next Rising Sun Kick or Vivify releases a wave of Chi energy that flows through friends and foes, dealing 7,486 Nature damage or 16,304 healing. Bounces up to 7 times to targets within 25 yards.
Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.
Reduces the cooldown of Roll by 5 sec and increases its maximum number of charges by 1.
Increases all damage dealt by 2%.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Touch of Death can now be used on targets with less than 15% health remaining, dealing 35% of your maximum health in damage.
Reduces magic damage you take by 60% for 6 sec, and transfers all currently active harmful magical effects on you back to their original caster if possible.
Reduces the cooldown of Ring of Peace by 5 sec and Song of Chi-Ji's cast time is reduced by 0.5 sec.

Turns your skin to stone for 15 sec, increasing your current and maximum health by 20% and reducing all damage you take by 20%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.
Your physical damage taken is reduced by 10% and an additional 10% every 4 sec until you receive a physical attack.
Expel Harm's healing is increased by up to 100%, based on your missing health.
Invoking Xuen, the White Tiger also spawns a White Tiger Statue at your location that pulses 11,056 damage to all enemies every 2 sec for 10 sec.
Fortifying Brew cooldown reduced by 30 sec.
Magical damage done increased by 4% and healing done increased by 4%.
You and your allies within 10 yards have 4% increased movement speed. Stacks with other similar effects.
Increases your Physical damage done by 4% and Avoidance increased by 4%.
Roll causes you to become lighter than air, allowing you to double jump to dash forward a short distance once within 5 sec, but the cooldown of Roll is increased by 2 sec.

You gain a bonus effect based on your current health.

Above 90% health: Movement speed increased by 5%. This bonus stacks with similar effects.

Between 90% and 35% health: Damage taken reduced by 5%.

Below 35% health: Healing received increased by 10%.
Touch of Death increases your damage by 5% for 30 sec after being cast and its cooldown is reduced by 90 sec.

Pummels all targets in front of you, dealing 149,163 Physical damage to your primary target and 80,548 damage to all other enemies over 3.6 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. Can be channeled while moving.

Fists of Fury's damage is increased by 100% of your haste and Fists of Fury does 10% more damage each time it deals damage, resetting when Fists of Fury ends.

Your auto attack speed is increased by 60% for 8 sec after Fists of Fury ends.

While out of combat, your Chi balances to 2 instead of depleting to empty.

Every 15 sec, your next Tiger Palm also casts Expel Harm and deals 30% additional damage.

 Expel Harm
Expel negative chi from your body, healing for 96,453 and dealing 10% of the amount healed as Nature damage to an enemy within 20 yards.
Rising Sun Kick increases the damage your target receives from you by 3% for 12 sec. Multiple instances may overlap.
Tiger Palm damage increased by 40%.
Increases your maximum Chi by 1, maximum Energy by 20, and your Energy regeneration by 10%.
Spinning Crane Kick damage increased by 30% and its radius is increased by 15%.

Tiger Palm causes your next Blackout Kick to strike an additional time, stacking up to 4.

Blackout Kick has a 12% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Rising Sun Kick.
Rising Sun Kick has a chance equal to 100% of your haste to trigger a second time, dealing 59,168 Physical damage and restoring 1 Chi.

Whenever you deal damage to a target with Fists of Fury, you gain a stack of Chi Energy up to a maximum of 30 stacks.

Using Spinning Crane Kick will cause the energy to detonate in a Chi Explosion, dealing 37,415 Nature damage to all enemies within 8 yards, reduced beyond 5 targets. The damage is increased by 5% for each stack of Chi Energy.
The Blackout Kick! effect also increases the damage of your next Blackout Kick by 350%.

Split into 3 elemental spirits for 15 sec, each spirit dealing 40% of normal damage and healing.

You directly control the Storm spirit, while Earth and Fire spirits mimic your attacks on nearby enemies.

While active, casting Storm, Earth, and Fire again will cause the spirits to fixate on your target.

Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate Flurry of Xuen, unleashing a barrage of deadly swipes to deal 81,482 Physical damage in a 10 yd cone, damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Invoking Xuen, the White Tiger activates Flurry of Xuen.
Spending Chi has a chance to make your next Spinning Crane Kick free and deal an additional 200% damage.
Strike with both fists at all enemies in front of you, dealing 269,001 Physical damage and reducing movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.
When you consume Blackout Kick!, you have a 100% chance to generate 1 Chi.
Blackout Kick damage increased by 10% and strikes an additional 2 targets at 80% effectiveness.

Summons an effigy of Xuen, the White Tiger for 20 sec. Xuen attacks your primary target, and strikes 3 enemies within 10 yards every 0.9 sec with Tiger Lightning for 5,665 Nature damage.

Every 4 sec, Xuen strikes your enemies with Empowered Tiger Lightning dealing 8% of the damage you have dealt to those targets in the last 4 sec.

Strike of the Windlord summons a whirling tornado around you, causing 96,314 Physical damage over 11.6 sec to all enemies within 9 yards. 

Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Strike of the Windlord grants you 4 stacks of Thunderfist and an additional stack for each additional enemy struck. 

Thunderfist discharges upon melee strikes, dealing 33,466 Nature damage.
You have a 100% chance to gain Blackout Kick! after consuming Dance of Chi-Ji.
You gain 15% haste for 20 sec after summoning your Celestial.
Your auto attacks have a 20% chance to instead kick your target dealing 25,816 Physical damage and increasing your damage dealt by 5% for 5 sec.
Targets hit by Strike of the Windlord have a 100% chance to be struck for 10% additional Nature damage from your spells and abilities for 10 sec.

Performs a devastating whirling upward strike, dealing 102,008 damage to all nearby enemies and an additional 64,485 damage to the first target struck. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Only usable while both Fists of Fury and Rising Sun Kick are on cooldown.

Rising Sun Kick critical strikes reduce the cooldown of Fists of Fury by 4 sec.

When Fists of Fury ends, the critical strike chance of Rising Sun Kick is increased by 40% for 5 sec.
Blackout Kick, Rising Sun Kick, and Spinning Crane Kick increase damage dealt by your next Fists of Fury by 3%, stacking up to 10 times.
Strike of the Windlord's cooldown is reduced by 10 sec and its damage is increased by 100%.
Whirling Dragon Punch has a 100% chance to activate Dance of Chi-Ji and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Your Combo Strikes grant a stacking 1% chance for your next Fists of Fury to grant 3% critical strike, haste, and mastery and invoke Xuen, The White Tiger for 10 sec.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.
Kick upwards, dealing 83,287 Physical damage, and reducing the effectiveness of healing on the target for 10 sec.
Kick upwards, dealing 83,089 Physical damage, and reducing the effectiveness of healing on the target for 10 sec.

Rising Sun Kick deals 70% increased damage. Spinning Crane Kick deals 10% additional damage.
Increases all healing taken by 4%.
Reduces all damage taken by 3%.

This effect also reduces the energy cost of Vivify by 75%.

Reduces the cooldown of Paralysis by 15 sec and the cooldown of Leg Sweep by 10 sec.

Every 15 sec, your next Rising Sun Kick or Vivify releases a wave of Chi energy that flows through friends and foes, dealing 7,619 Nature damage or 16,108 healing. Bounces up to 7 times to targets within 25 yards.
Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.

Expel Harm's healing is increased by up to 100%, based on your missing health.
Invoking Xuen, the White Tiger also spawns a White Tiger Statue at your location that pulses 11,056 damage to all enemies every 2 sec for 10 sec.

Your auto attack speed is increased by 60% for 8 sec after Fists of Fury ends.

Every 15 sec, your next Tiger Palm also casts Expel Harm and deals 30% additional damage.

 Expel Harm
Expel negative chi from your body, healing for 93,278 and dealing 10% of the amount healed as Nature damage to an enemy within 20 yards.

Tiger Palm damage increased by 40%.

Spinning Crane Kick damage increased by 30% and its radius is increased by 15%.

Blackout Kick has a 12% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Rising Sun Kick.

Invoking Xuen, the White Tiger activates Flurry of Xuen.

Blackout Kick damage increased by 10% and strikes an additional 2 targets at 80% effectiveness.

Every 4 sec, Xuen strikes your enemies with Empowered Tiger Lightning dealing 8% of the damage you have dealt to those targets in the last 4 sec.

Strike of the Windlord summons a whirling tornado around you, causing 97,743 Physical damage over 11.6 sec to all enemies within 9 yards. 

Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Strike of the Windlord grants you 4 stacks of Thunderfist and an additional stack for each additional enemy struck. 

Thunderfist discharges upon melee strikes, dealing 33,466 Nature damage.

Targets hit by Strike of the Windlord have a 100% chance to be struck for 10% additional Nature damage from your spells and abilities for 10 sec.

Performs a devastating whirling upward strike, dealing 103,628 damage to all nearby enemies and an additional 64,596 damage to the first target struck. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Only usable while both Fists of Fury and Rising Sun Kick are on cooldown.

Rising Sun Kick critical strikes reduce the cooldown of Fists of Fury by 4 sec.

When Fists of Fury ends, the critical strike chance of Rising Sun Kick is increased by 40% for 5 sec.

Whirling Dragon Punch has a 100% chance to activate Dance of Chi-Ji and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Your Combo Strikes grant a stacking 1% chance for your next Fists of Fury to grant 3% critical strike, haste, and mastery and invoke Xuen, The White Tiger for 10 sec.
You gain up to 30% movement speed  and 15% magical damage reduction based on your current level of Stagger.
Reduces the cooldown of Fortifying Brew by 50%.
Heals the target for 233,132 over 7.2 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.
Kick upwards, dealing 84,012 Physical damage, and reducing the effectiveness of healing on the target for 10 sec.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.
Kick upwards, dealing 83,149 Physical damage, and reducing the effectiveness of healing on the target for 10 sec.

Reduces all damage taken by 3%.
Expel Harm's healing increased by 5% and critical strike chance increased by 15%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.

Every 15 sec, your next Rising Sun Kick or Vivify releases a wave of Chi energy that flows through friends and foes, dealing 7,558 Nature damage or 16,432 healing. Bounces up to 7 times to targets within 25 yards.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Rising Sun Kick deals 70% increased damage. Spinning Crane Kick deals 10% additional damage.
Reduces the cooldown of Roll by 5 sec and increases its maximum number of charges by 1.
Fortifying Brew cooldown reduced by 30 sec.
Expel Harm's critical healing is increased by 50%.
Find resilience in the flow of chi in battle, gaining a magic absorb shield for 0.6% of your max health every 3 sec in combat, stacking up to 6%.
Reduces all damage you take by 20% to 50% for 10 sec, with larger attacks being reduced by more.
Expel Harm's healing is increased by up to 100%, based on your missing health.
You and your allies within 10 yards have 8% increased healing taken from all sources.
Touch of Death increases your damage by 5% for 30 sec after being cast and its cooldown is reduced by 90 sec.
Your attacks have a chance to resonate, dealing 3,117 Nature damage to enemies within 8 yds.
Summons a White Tiger Statue at the target location for 10 sec, pulsing 11,056 damage to all enemies every 2 sec for 10 sec.
Smash a keg of brew on the target, dealing 20,738 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yds and reducing their movement speed by 20% for 15 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Clears 50% of your damage delayed with Stagger.

Niuzao's teachings allow you to shuffle during combat, increasing the effectiveness of your Stagger by 100%.

Shuffle is granted by attacking enemies with your Keg Smash, Blackout Kick, and Spinning Crane Kick.

When you take damage, you have a chance to summon a Healing Sphere.

Healing Sphere:
Summon a Healing Sphere visible only to you. Moving through this Healing Sphere heals you for 69,895.

Rising Sun Kick and Blackout Kick have a chance to summon a Healing Sphere.

Healing Sphere:
Summon a Healing Sphere visible only to you. Moving through this Healing Sphere heals you for 71,681.
Purify 5% of your Staggered damage each time you gain 3 sec of Shuffle duration.
Dealing damage with Blackout Kick increases the damage of your next Keg Smash by 10%, stacking up to 4 times.
Summons a whirling tornado around you, causing 95,413 Physical damage over 11.6 sec to all enemies within 9 yards. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

A swig of strong brew that coalesces purified chi escaping your body into a celestial guard, absorbing 236,391 damage.

Purifying Stagger damage increases absorption by up to 200%.
Reduces all damage taken by 60% for 8 sec. Being hit by a melee attack, or taking another action will cancel this effect.

Breathe fire on targets in front of you, causing 11,169 Fire damage. Deals reduced damage to secondary targets.

Targets affected by Keg Smash will also burn, taking 7,363 Fire damage and dealing 5% reduced damage to you for 12 sec.
Purifying Brew increases the absorption of your next Celestial Brew by up to 200%, based on Stagger purified.
Purifying Brew now has 2 charges.
Purifying Brew instantly heals you for 25% of the purified Stagger damage.
Blackout Kick's damage increased by 20% and it strikes an additional 2 targets.
When you use Keg Smash, the remaining cooldown on Breath of Fire is reset.
Chug some Black Ox Brew, which instantly refills your Energy, Purifying Brew charges, and resets the cooldown of Celestial Brew.

Summons an effigy of Niuzao, the Black Ox for 25 sec. Niuzao attacks your primary target, and frequently Stomps, damaging all nearby enemies.

While active, 40% of damage delayed by Stagger is instead Staggered by Niuzao.
Reduces the cooldown of Purifying Brew and Celestial Brew by 20%.
Activating Purifying Brew or Celestial Brew grants you 10% dodge for 5 sec.
Each time you dodge or an enemy misses you, your next Tiger Palm or Spinning Crane Kick deals 100% increased damage.

After using Breath of Fire, you breathe fire 2 additional times, each dealing 4,422 Fire damage.

Breath of Fire damage increased by up to 100% based on your level of Stagger.
Blackout Kick deals an additional 10% damage. Blackout Kick critical hits grant an additional 2 stacks of Elusive Brawler.

Hurl a brew created from the bones of your enemies at the ground, coating all targets struck for 10 sec. Your abilities have a 50% chance to affect the target a second time at 40% effectiveness as Shadow damage or healing.

Spinning Crane Kick refunds 1 Chi when striking enemies with your Bonedust Brew active.

Hurls a flaming keg at the target location, dealing 59,528 Fire damage to nearby enemies, causing your attacks against them to deal 4,614 additional Fire damage, and causing their melee attacks to deal 100% reduced damage for the next 3 sec.

Blackout Kick also empowers your next ability:

Tiger Palm: Damage increased by 100%.
Breath of Fire: Damage increased by 50%, and damage reduction increased by 5%.
Keg Smash: Reduces the remaining cooldown on your Brews by 2 additional sec.
Celestial Brew: Gain up to 3 additional stacks of Purified Chi.
Purifying Brew: Pauses Stagger damage for 3 sec.

For the next 30 sec, your Mastery is increased by 23.3%. Additionally, Rising Sun Kick reduces Chi costs by 1 for 5 sec, and Blackout Kick reduces the cooldown of affected abilities by an additional 1 sec.
Your abilities have a low chance to cast Bonedust Brew at your target's location.
Keg Smash deals 20% additional damage, and has 1 additional charge.
Revival's cooldown is reduced by 16%, and provides immunity to magical damage and harmful effects for 2 sec.
Heals the target for 233,132 over 7.2 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.
Kick upwards, dealing 84,285 Physical damage, and reducing the effectiveness of healing on the target for 10 sec.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Kick upwards, dealing 82,346 Physical damage, and reducing the effectiveness of healing on the target for 10 sec.
Reduces all damage taken by 3%.
Expel Harm's healing increased by 5% and critical strike chance increased by 15%.
Vivify healing is increased by 40%.
Detox additionally removes all Poison and Disease effects.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.

Every 10 sec, your next Vivify becomes instant and its healing is increased by 40%.

This effect also reduces the energy cost of Vivify by 75%.
Increases all damage dealt by 4%.
Reduces the cooldown of Paralysis by 15 sec and the cooldown of Leg Sweep by 10 sec.

Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 3 sec.

Turns your skin to stone for 15 sec, increasing your current and maximum health by 20% and reducing all damage you take by 20%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.

Hurls a torrent of Chi energy up to 40 yds forward, dealing 46,454 Nature damage to all enemies, and 48,746 healing to the Monk and all allies in its path. Healing and damage reduced beyond 5 targets.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Rising Sun Kick deals 70% increased damage. Spinning Crane Kick deals 10% additional damage.
Reduces the cooldown of Roll by 5 sec and increases its maximum number of charges by 1.
Fortifying Brew cooldown reduced by 30 sec.
Expel Harm's critical healing is increased by 50%.
Reduces magic damage you take by 60% for 6 sec, and transfers all currently active harmful magical effects on you back to their original caster if possible.
Reduces all damage you take by 20% to 50% for 10 sec, with larger attacks being reduced by more.
Touch of Death can now be used on targets with less than 15% health remaining, dealing 35% of your maximum health in damage.
Expel Harm's healing is increased by up to 100%, based on your missing health.
You and your allies within 10 yards have 8% increased healing taken from all sources.
You and your allies within 10 yards take 4% reduced damage from area-of-effect attacks.
When your healing spells heal an ally whose health is below 35% maximum health, you gain an additional 10% healing for the next 4 sec.
Wraps the target in healing mists, healing for 72,634 over 6 sec, and increasing healing received from your other spells by 30%.

Surrounds the target with healing mists, restoring 45,780 health over 20 sec.

If Renewing Mist heals a target past maximum health, it will travel to another injured ally within 20 yds.
Encases the target in a cocoon of Chi energy for 12 sec, absorbing 568,471 damage and increasing all healing over time received by 50%.

Receive a jolt of energy, empowering your next spell cast:

Enveloping Mist: Immediately heals for 65,013 and is instant cast.
Renewing Mist: Duration increased by 10 sec.
Vivify: No mana cost.
Rising Sun Kick: Cooldown reduced by 9 sec.
Expel Harm: Transfers 25% additional healing into damage and creates a Chi Cocoon absorbing 189,490 damage.

For every 25,000 Mana you spend, you gain 1 stack of Mana Tea, with a chance equal to your critical strike chance to generate 1 extra stack.

Mana Tea:
Consumes 1 stack of Mana Tea per 0.4 sec to restore 2,550 Mana and reduces the Mana cost of your spells by 30% for 1.00 sec per stack of Mana Tea consumed after drinking.

Can be cast while moving, but movement speed is reduced by 40% while channeling.

Tiger Palm causes your next Blackout Kick to strike an additional time, stacking up to 4.

Blackout Kick has a 12% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Rising Sun Kick.

Heals all party and raid members within 40 yds for 311,969 and clears them of 3 harmful Magic, all Poison, and all Disease effects.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
Vivify heals all allies with your Renewing Mist active for 26,207, reduced beyond 5 allies.
Drink a healing elixir, healing you for 10% of your maximum health.

Renewing Mist's heal over time has a chance to cause your next Vivify to also trigger a Zen Pulse on its target and all allies with Renewing Mist, healing them for 33,613 increased by 6% per Renewing Mist active, up to 30%.
Life Cocoon applies Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist to the target.

Summon an effigy of Chi-Ji for 25 sec that kicks up 3 Gust of Mists when you Blackout Kick, Rising Sun Kick, or Spinning Crane Kick, healing up to 2 allies for 20, and reducing the cost and cast time of your next Enveloping Mist by 33%, stacking.

Chi-Ji's presence makes you immune to movement impairing effects.
Zen Pulse triggers a second time at 80% effectiveness if cast on targets with Enveloping Mist.
Rising Sun Kick and Enveloping Mist apply Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds.
Reduces the cooldown of Life Cocoon by 45 sec.
Increases Enveloping Mist's duration by 1 sec and its healing bonus by 10%.

While active, Yu'lon and Chi'Ji heal up to 5 nearby targets with Enveloping Breath when you cast Enveloping Mist, healing for 23,885 over 6 sec, and increasing the healing they receive from you by 10%.

When activated, Yu'lon and Chi'Ji apply Chi Cocoons to 5 targets within 40 yds, absorbing 284,235 damage for 10 sec.
Mana Tea now channels 50% faster and generates 20% more Mana.

Strike the ground fiercely to expose a path of jade for 30 sec that increases your movement speed by 20% while inside, dealing 8,818 Nature damage to up to 5 enemies, and restoring 17,750 health to up to 5 allies within 30 yds caught in the path. Up to 5 enemies caught in the path suffer an additional 13,734 damage.
Your Tiger Palm, Blackout Kick, Rising Sun Kick, and Crackling Jade Lightning heal up to 5 injured allies within 40 yds for 30% of the damage done, split evenly among them.
Reduces the cooldown of Invoke Yul'on, the Jade Serpent by 1 min, but decreases its duration to 12 sec.

Draws in all nearby clouds of mist, healing the friendly target and up to 2 nearby allies for 28,922 per cloud absorbed.

A cloud of mist is generated every 8 sec while in combat.
Your Blackout Kicks strike 3 targets and have an additional 10% chance to reset the cooldown of your Rising Sun Kick while within your Jadefire Stomp.

After using Thunder Focus Tea, your next spell gives 8% of a stat for 10 sec:
Enveloping Mist: Critical strike
Renewing Mist: Haste
Vivify: Mastery
Rising Sun Kick: Versatility
Expel Harm: Versatility
Increases Sheilun's Gift cloud of mist generation to every 4 sec.

Your abilities reset Jadefire Stomp 100% more often. While within Jadefire Stomp, your Tiger Palms strike twice, your Blackout Kicks strike an additional 2 targets at 20% effectiveness, and your Spinning Crane Kick heals 3 nearby allies for 120% of the damage done.
Rising Sun Kick heals all allies with your Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist for 5,000, and extends those effects by 4 sec, up to 100% of their original duration.
Sheilun's Gift heals 2 additional allies and its cast time is reduced by 0.5 sec.
